thread.title: BREAKING NEWS: 7 Earth-Sized Planets in Trappist-1 System, 3 in Habitable Zone!
thread.title_full: BREAKING NEWS: 7 Earth-Sized Planets in Trappist-1 System, 3 in Habitable Zone!

author: James F. McGrath
title: BREAKING NEWS: 7 Earth-Sized Planets in Trappist-1 System, 3 in Habitable Zone!
text: NASA just announced that, using the Spitzer Telescope , they have detected a total of seven earth-like planets orbiting the star Trappist-1 , and three of them lie in the habitable zone in which liquid water can exist. We can be sure that this system is going to be getting a lot of research attention in coming years. Located 40 light years away, I imagine that weâ€™ll also try to send a probe in that direction as soon as possible, too.
